alert.note: Alert for Southeast Fayette; Southeast Nicholas; Southeast Raleigh; Southeast Webster (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 07 at 3:30AM EDT until October 09 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Southeast Raleigh, Southeast Fayette, Southeast Nicholas and Southeast Webster Counties. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Fayette; Southeast Nicholas; Southeast Raleigh; Southeast Webster
